snippet: The two militaries will train together on disaster relief, humanitarian assistance and maritime security.
abstract: Marines from the Philippines and the United States begin 10 days of joint exercises focused on disaster relief, humanitarian assistance and maritime security; exercises, now in their 29th year, come at time of increased tensions in South China Sea.
lead_paragraph: The two militaries will train together on disaster relief, humanitarian assistance and maritime security.

headline.main: Philippines and U.S. Start Joint Exercises
headline.print_headline: Philippines And U.S. Start Joint Exercises

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
